named-query.name: getModelYearsForMake
named-query.query: select distinct vehicleModel.manufacturingYear from VehicleModel vehicleModel where vehicleModel.vehicleMake.id = :vehicleMakeId

named-query.name: getVehicleModelForMakeAndYear
named-query.query: select vehicleModel from VehicleModel vehicleModel where vehicleModel.vehicleMake.id = :vehicleMakeId and vehicleModel.manufacturingYear = :modelYear

named-query.name: getVehicleSubModelsForVehicleModel
named-query.query: select vehicleSubModel from VehicleSubModel vehicleSubModel where vehicleSubModel.vehicleModel.id = :vehicleModelId
